title: President approves Rs 0.2 mln for welfare of legendary Deeba Khanum
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 22 (APP):President Dr Arif Alvi on Friday approved Rs 0.2 million for the countryâ€™s legendary film actor Deeba Khanum out of the welfare fund for artists.
The President telephoned Deeba Khanum and inquired about her health.
Deeba Khanum was one of the leading film actresses during 1960s and 1970s in Urdu and Punjabi films.
